title: [GAMEPLAY?] Master Arcanist Ziggs recall animation is bugged - Too short
body:
Look at this video recall at 0:50 second:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NFbkRwg9cc0

Then look at the actual in game ziggs recall in this video at 4 min 40:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ddSsJirSPI

----

In the actual in game recall (Live) he doesnt jump and snap his bomb in the book like in the release and pre-release video.

I really enjoy the skin but I would like to have de recall animation to be correct ! (Yeah, im one of those guy who care about recall animation :P)

Thanks for your support !

replies.body:
Hiya Razhimkar! 

The reason you're seeing a shorter recall in the second video is likely because this person has the Phasewalker mastery equipped, which causes recalls to be one second shorter. Something similar occurs when Master Arcanist Ziggs has Baron, because he'll have an empowered recall.
Thanks alot I didnt realize, but... will you ajust it ? Because I like having Phasewalker, but I still wanna see a complete recall animation :)
